argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_id | |- ( p = P -> p = P ) |
| 2 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( p = P -> dom p = dom P ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_unieqd | |- ( p = P -> U. dom p = U. dom P ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( p = P -> ( p ` U. dom p ) = ( P ` U. dom P ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( p = P -> ( ( p ` U. dom p ) = 1 <-> ( P ` U. dom P ) = 1 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-prob | |- Prob = { p e. U. ran measures | ( p ` U. dom p ) = 1 } |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( P e. Prob <-> ( P e. U. ran measures /\ ( P ` U. dom P ) = 1 ) ) |
